Descriptions.Text:
Traditional Danish Lunch

They serve a traditional Danish lunch menu between 11 am and 3 pm which can be enjoyed either in the cosy lounge with a fireplace or in the lovely secluded back garden.

Drop by the Peter Gift pub for traditional food and great beers

At Peter Gift they also serve 45 different brands of great beers from all over the world, so there is something for all tastes. For generations the pub has been a meeting-point for guests of all ages, and everyone is welcome.

A world of fun

A modest admission fee gives you access to a wealth of games, and a world of fun, where everyone can join in. If you feel like a bite to eat or something to drink while playing, small delicious dishes, coffee and cakes are available for purchase.

You may also bring your own board games, and even your own food. Please note, however, that the admission fee also applies whether you play using the café’s or your own games, and that you may not bring your own drinks or snacks.

Descriptions.Text:
Cozy atmosphere and relaxation in the high seat

With its location just a stone's throw from St. Clemens Bro and its vibrant urban life, Restaurant LAVA is an atmospheric oasis located at the Åboulevarden in Aarhus. Restaurant LAVA is relaxing and comfortable.

The restaurant is decorated in an authentic French style with a cozy dining area and a welcoming bar where you can enjoy a drink before dinner. There is also the possibility to book banqueting rooms or the whole restaurant for festive occasions. Finding parking for a restaurant has never been easier as Dokk1 is just a stone's throw from Restaurant LAVA.

If you want to be sure to get a seat, it is a good idea to book a table either over the  telephone or through online booking.

Descriptions.Text:
Café Hack is the place to go

- either before or after going to see a performance at the Aarhus Theatre,
- for a fun or relaxed evening out, enjoying either the bistro menu or a more extensive full-evening menu,
- for throwing a major celebration, whether private or business (from 50 to 300 guests).

Culinary delights

Boasting exquisite gastronomy, Café Hack is always a culinary delight to visit, with choice wines served with a twinkle in the eye while enjoying the truly unique atmosphere of this beautiful house, designed by the Danish architect Hack Kampmann with the Aarhus Theatre next door, right in the heart of the city.

Descriptions.Text:
Gastronomy and exquisite wine

The inn has a restaurant with a wonderful ambience, combining tradition with modernity. Here you can enjoy an exquisite dinner and choose from one of Denmark's largest wine collections.

Enclosed back garden

Weather permitting, guests may also be served in the inn's charming back garden.

Easy to get there and back

The local train service is right outside, and there are excellent bus links within easy walking distance in the main street. In addition Moesgaard Museum and the Vilhelmsborg manor attractions are located close by if you are planning a prolonged stay at the inn.

Best of Award 

Furthermore, the restaurant has received Wine Spectator's Best of Award of Excellence for its outstanding wine cellar.

Descriptions.Text:
Restaurant Pondus

Pondus combines the best of Danish cuisine with the homely and relaxed atmosphere of the French bistro style.

Simple and modern meals are enjoyed in cosy surroundings with rustic decor, which reinforces the relaxed and friendly atmosphere that defines Pondus. In the summer months, you can sit outside and enjoy watching the city life.

The menu changes with the seasons and always focuses on excellent taste

You can choose from à la carte, the three-course menu of the day or the Pondus package. We purchase our wines from small European producers, and the majority of them are organic too.

Restaurant Pondus received a Bib Gourmand in Guide Michelin Nordic Countries 2019, which is awarded for quality food at reasonable prices.

Descriptions.Text:
The roofed garden is the hotel meeting place complete with lounge, comfortable furniture, bar and restaurant under the same glass ceiling.

The restaurant in its present form was established in 1984 and is now the favoured meeting place of hotel guests as well as prominent citizens of Aarhus. The great tree in the middle of the room and the many plants really make the room come alive.

In this beautiful environment you may enjoy a morning buffet, coffee, dinner, or a drink in the comfy armchairs.

In the Guide Michelin Nordic Countries 2020, Atrium was awarded with the Michelin Plate, given to restaurants that serve a good meal.

Descriptions.Text:
40 young croupiers play up to the guests, who are not all wealthy, professional gamblers; everybody is welcome to come and try their luck at the roulette, at the Black Jack-tables, or at one of the electronic gambling machines.

Black Jack and roulette in the center of Aarhus  

The rebuilding of the old cinema, Royal Cinema, was done by a group of Danish, Polish and Russian artists, led by the Danish litographic artist, Hans Krull. Hans Krull, who lives in Aarhus, came up with the idea of the 3 divinely beautiful goddesses of fortune, who are made of bronze and ornaments the entrance of the casino. 
 
Indoor, the many artists have worked with reliefs, paintings, and ingenious stucco works, and the result has become a real attraction.

Top Quality

At KöD you will find nothing but the finest quality. The food is constantly quality assured, just as the menu at the restaurant is continuously adapted to the tastes and requests of its guests.

Great wine and cocktails

After dinner you can explore the wide range of drinks served by the talented bartenders accompanied by great music; the perfect end to a perfect night.

Dinner parties at KöD

KöD has many options for adjusting the restaurant to the size of your group, regardless of whether you wish a spacious setting or an intimate feeling. KöD offers a wide range of menus, pleasant atmosphere and experienced waiters who are ready to serve you.

Restaurant KöD also offers their different menus for catering.

Descriptions.Text:
With an age limit of 23+, LouLou is the place for the adult audience, and the cocktailbar has already become a popular go-to-venue among the Aarhusians.

Fashionable lounges, cocktails and an exciting dance floor

The decor is unique with fashionable lounges at different levels, while everything from flamingos to exotic flowers adorn the walls. In the ceiling above the dance floor hangs stylish incandescent bulbs, which makes the dance floor exciting and takes the mind into a French underground bar.

The cocktail menu is varied and the bartenders are dressed in stylish outfit with shirts and suspenders. They are ready to help and guide you so you can find your favourite cocktail, all of which is built of quality ingredients.

You can also book a table and let yourself be spoiled by LouLou's skilled hostesses. Here you can enjoy your friends' company in the cozy lounges, while the music, night and party flow.

Age limit +23

Descriptions.Text:
Traditional Danish Dishes

On the menu at Klokken Aarhus, you will find traditional, Danish dishes for lunch as well as dinner. For instance, don’t miss the smørrebrød classics of panfried plaice, roast beef or homemade chicken salad. Or sink your teeth into one of Klokken Aarhus’ warm dishes such as fried beef tartare – known as Parisian minced beef steak – patty shells or the unofficial Danish national dish pork’n parsley gravy.

Homemade schnapps

Great Danish food comes with great drinks. At Klokken Aarhus you can get a taste of no less than 12 kinds of homemade schnapps; one for each hour on the clock – enjoy!

Smørrebrød ad libitum or as take-away

At lunch Klokken offers all smørrebrød as ad libitum at a reasonable price so you get to taste different kinds. Do you wish to eat at home, outside or at your hotel, Klokken also offers smørrebrød as take-away.

Descriptions.Text:
Nordic gastronomy and design fusion 

A visit at Villa Dining is in many ways similar to enjoying a wonderful meal at your friends’ house. After a warm greeting at the door you will be led through the rooms of the beautiful mansion and shown to your table, where you can relax into soft and comfortable designer furniture.

Choose Gold or Silver menu 

At Villa Dining they have invented a wonderful evening concept. You can choose between two different menus, the Gold menu and the Silver menu.

The Gold menu gives you the full Villa Dining experience with snacks, appetizer and three delicious courses. All this is accompanied by a perfectly matched wine menu chosen especially for the beautiful meal of the evening. With the Gold menu the wine bar is also free. The evening is rounded off with coffee, avec and a little something for that sweet tooth.

The Silver menu is served Monday to Thursday and comes with snacks, starter, main course and dessert. Drinks can be purchased to accompany the menu. Both the Silver menu and the Gold menu presents you with the season’s best flavors and here you really get value for your money.

The beautiful building of this charming old inn dates back to 1826 and has unspoilt views of the Bay of Aarhus. Here you can enjoy classic Danish dishes and an authentic inn ambience.

Scrumptious breakfast buffet and Danish delicacies for afternoon coffee

During weekends you can indulge yourself at the inn's gorgeous breakfast buffet or sample their delicious selection of sweet Danish delicacies for afternoon coffee.

Descriptions.Text:
Visit Studenterhus Aarhus 

Studenterhus Aarhus are placed at Aarhus University. There is a café with access to outdoor service and bar in the basement with a long tradition for students to hang out outside of their studying. In the bar you can find beer from all corners of the world. The Café and the Bar are open during the day and also all night. At Studenterhus Aarhus you can also find a venue for live music called Stakladen. Stakladen is the place for both new and up coming Danish bands and more famous and well known bands. But it is also the place for lots of student parties and cultural events.

Descriptions.Text:
Wine and cocktails at Basso Aarhus

The winelist of Basso counts a varied range of Italian wines, like the cocktail selection springs from Italy. With the use of Italian products, classics will be served in new, crisp and exciting combinations with something for everyone.

A modern and Nordic twist on Italian dishes blended with a casual and intimate atmosphere is the theme of this cosy gem in Aarhus.

Social dining

Basso Aarhus is housed at Skolegade 21. The premises are surprising, refreshing and stylish, and the interior reflects the intimacy and informal atmosphere that you share as a family or good friends when you enjoy a good dining experience together.

Welcome to Social Dining at Restaurant Basso, where the complete dining experience is given by being together on something!

Dinner parties at basso

Basso has put a lot of effort in designing and creating the best framework for you and your dinner party. Like this, the restaurant has many options for adjusting them to the size of your group, regardless of whether you wish a spacious setting or an intimate feeling.

Basso offers a wide range of menus, pleasant atmosphere and experienced waiters who are ready to serve you and Basso also offers their menu for catering.

Descriptions.Text:
Danish-owned burger chain

In addition to juicy burgers and crispy fries, the Danish-owned burger chain also serves chili cheese tops and chicken bites.

Burgers made with love og honesty

Burger Shack has been on everyone's lips - for better or worse. In 2020 the ambitious restaurant group DiningSix took over the burger chain, and now Burger Shack is back in top form.

Exciting "Shack menus"

You have the option to choose from seven different "Shack menus". There is something for everyone. The menu includes the aforementioned "Shack Fries", topped with Italian cheese and thyme. Burger Shack uses 100% Danish beef from Danish farmers and 100% Danish chicken.

Delicious vegan burger

Maybe you are vegan or maybe you just don’t eat meat. It’s not a problem. Burger Shack serves a vegan burger menu. The plant steak is made from pea protein and in the vegan brioche burger bun you will also find vegan cheddar and vegan mayo.

Children's universe

The young visitors to the burger restaurant get a small gift to take home. The menu has a small book about Jack and all of his adventures. The children's menu is served in Jack's own cabin.

Burger Shack across the country

In Aarhus, you will find Burger Shack in three locations:
Frederiksgade 39Skolegade 24Otte Ruds Gade 106
The burger chain is actually spread all over the country and in the Aarhus Region you will find Burger Shack in Randers at Middelgade 14 and Burger Shack Silkeborg on Estrupsgade 6.

#burgershack #visitaarhus #visitaarhusregion

Descriptions.Text:
From coffee berries to a cup of coffee

The fine art of coffee making is preserved at Great Coffee as they roast the coffee in-house and even take part in the Coffee Academy, where you can learn more about the drink we all love. Great Coffee takes pride in staying up to date with the newest brewing methods, coffee variations and much more - all with you in mind!

Travels the world to find the right coffee

Great Coffee makes an effort to ensure the quality of the coffee they serve. They travel the world of coffee and tests the quality of the coffee on sight together with the local former. Coffee is more than a drink - it is the beginning of a relationship!

Award winning coffee

Together with two coffee farms Great Coffee has developed its own preparation methods and has won Gold five times as Barrista, achieved two finale positions in the World Cup for barristas and a silver medal in the World Cup for LatteArt.

Descriptions.Text:
Five Starters, Five Main Courses, Cheese and Two Desserts

Going out to dinner should not be a hassle. If you are able to pour your own water when you are at home, you are probably able to do so when you are at Restaurant Komfur, as well. And there definitely is a difference between eating in and eating out. But it is in fact all about great food and delicious wine – not about being dressed up to the nines and insisting on a certain notion of what great service should be like.

Restaurant Komfur look forward to welcoming you.

Descriptions.Text:
Delicious Danish food and brilliant cocktails

With Danish inspired food and interesting spirits, St. Pauls Apothek tries to relieve and treat even the toughest diseases. At St. Pauls Apothek you will find a special kind of atmosphere and the dinner guests will often stay after their meals and continue with a new and different menu with various cocktails and other spirits. And slowly the restaurant will turn into a cocktail bar - almost without you even noticing it!

If you are more than 20 people - no problem! At St. Pauls you will be able to use the room "Laboratoriet", the laboratory, where you will be able to sit more privately.

Descriptions.Text:
Quality moments

Time and mental presence are essential elements in the creation of quality moments with the people we love.

Being present

Langhoff & Juul is a sanctuary which provides ideal conditions for enjoying the moment together while feasting on a spectacular meal. The restaurant bases its menu on organic ingredients and sustainability, and in the private atrium you can enjoy the delicious food as well as the wonderful, intimate atmosphere in the very heart of Aarhus.

Descriptions.Text:
Creative cocktails of the finest order

Today the old chemist's shop houses its sixth generation of chemists. Maybe not your classic chemists, but their award-winning bartenders certainly serve innovative cocktails that can soothe all sorts of ailments. St. Pauls Apothek, which is renowned for its cocktail menu, serves a cocktail prepared especially for each individual course. But you can also enjoy your cocktail on its own. At St. Pauls they serve unique and delicious cocktails, carefully concocted for the occasion.

Inspirations from London to New York

The drinks menu offers 30 cocktails with inspiration from abroad, including the cities of New York and London. And the inspiration for the bar equipment comes from Japan, complete with a huge block of ice behind the bar from which the bartender cuts ice-cubes for the drinks.

Descriptions.Text:
Sappho is an alternative to the established café environment. Here you can come as you are. Although the café is primarily a place for women, the male audience is also very welcome.

LGBTQ meeting place in Aarhus

Sapphos is also used by several local LGBTQ associations for meetings, gatherings, etc. You can read more about the groups on the Sappho’s website and see if there are any relevant to you. The groups include LGBT Aarhus Advisory, LGBT Youth, T-Group, Tribal Network, Danish D-Lite and Aarhus Pride.

Info and opening hours

The cafe is open on Fridays at 19: 00 - 23: 00 and the 1st and 3rd Saturday of the month at 19: 00-23: 00th. Be aware that you must be a member to join. It costs 50 kroner a year.

 #aarhuspride #lgbtungdom #lgbtdanmark

Descriptions.Text:
Gourmet Coffee in Aarhus

The coffee bar was designed and made by all the three partners behind it. You could perhaps call the style of the coffee bar modern Nordic design in fusion with street-style by means of recycled materials, wood, and workmanship.

The coffee

A lot of energy goes into making you a cup of world-class coffee. The coffees beans, which are delivered once a week, come from London from a specially selected roasting house where they have more than 20 years of experience in the art of coffee roasting.

Name: Bådcafe - Boat cafe at Marselisborg Harbour

Descriptions.Text:
At the boat café (Bådcafe) you can enjoy the marvelous view of the Aarhus harbour, the beautiful beaches, the city, Aarhus East, green forests and of course the maritime life at the marina with waves and boats of all sizes.

Dine at the marina

Sitting at the Boat Café is almost like sitting on a marina in Spain or France while enjoying a cold glass of Rosé or a cocktail. On Saturdays and Sundays you can enjoy a delicious brunch from 10:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.

Cocktails

Every Friday and Saturday you can enjoy cocktails from 5:00 PM - 11:00 PM

Sustainable and great taste

At Restaurant GÄST the old Italian cousine traditions and creativity from the new Nordic kitchen all come together. The food is made by local and seasonal ingredients, and always with the great taste and sustainability in focus.

Red or white? Carefully chosen wines will be served with the homemade pasta, chrunchy brushettas or carpaccio with a small twist.

Michelin

Restaurant GÄST in Aarhus has yet again been rewarded with the Michelin Plate in the Michelin Guide Nordic Countries. The Michelin Plate is given to restaurants where you will have a great meal.

Descriptions.Text:
Organic-profile

The café has a relaxed and green interior, as the Student Housing Fund follows a sustainable concept and has received the Silver Organic Cuisine Label from the Ministry of Food Agriculture and Fisheries for an average food and bakery production of 60-90% organic ingredients.

All baked goods are baked freshly every day in our own bakery located directly opposite the café.
All food is produced in our own kitchen from scratch using fresh, seasonal ingredients.

Coffee to-go or stay

In Nobel's Café & Deli you will find a well-stocked coffee menu and delicious cakes from organic flour and butter, such as: Raspberry Slice, Lemon Moon, Napoleon Hat, Brownies with salt caramel, Croissants or Cookies.

The Deli

The cafe also functions as a small deli shop selling bread, To-Go lunch snacks, a daily Take-Away dish, a wide range of other homemade quality products like Toblerone, desserts, Mayo, Pesto and Aioli.
We also stock a large selection of organic fruit cordials, fizzy drinks, kombucha, juice and wine.

Parking

Free parking is available close to the café.

Descriptions.Text:
A world of fun

A modest admission fee gives you access to a wealth of games, and a world of fun, where everyone can join in. If you feel like a bite to eat or something to drink while playing, small delicious dishes, coffee and cakes are available for purchase.

You may also bring your own board games, and even your own food. Please note, however, that the admission fee also applies whether you play using the café’s or your own games, and that you may not bring your own drinks or snacks.

If you are also mad about playing board games, challenging others as well as yourself, well, then you definitely want to drop by Aarhus Brætspilscafé. Bring your family or friends along, play a game of ludo, backgammon, Trivial Pursuit, or, or... Everyone is welcome for a laugh and a good time in a totally relaxed setting.

 

#aarhusbrætspilscafe  #visitaarhus #visitaarhusregion

Descriptions.Text:
The Majority of the Beer is Consumed Locally

The people behind Aarhus Bryghus combined have more than 100 years of experience in the brewing industry and base their work on both tradition and renewal. Aarhus Bryghus brew beer for pleasing your palate, for sharing and for savouring with your food – and the assortment ranges from an international Pilsner and an India Pale Ale to an Imperial Stout matured in a cask.

Whisky and Heather Gin

In August 2016, Aarhus Bryghus launched their first whiskey, and since then, more products have come out under the name "Spirit of Aarhus". In December 2018, the brewery launched their Heather Gin, as well. The “Spirit of Aarhus”-products are primarily sold in the brewery store, which is open whenever the brewery is. At the brewery store, you can also get the bottled beer in crates or wrapped as gift boxes.

Friday-get-together

Every Friday from 3:00 to 7:00 pm, Aarhus Bryghus opens its doors to a get-together, where you can taste their many varieties of drinks and enjoy them from a bottle as well as poured from a cask.

#aarhusbryghus  #visitaarhus #visitaarhusregion

Descriptions.Text:
Located in an old timbered house - one of Aarhus' absolute oldest houses - Go' Kaffe x Blue Caviar offers two concepts under the same roof: fantastic coffee served with love and passion in a relaxed environment (with cozy hidden backyard), mixed with a unique menswear concept that offers heritage products of the absolute highest quality within denim and boots.

Go' Kaffe

At Go' Kaffe, the customers are always top priority. The close contact and interaction with customers create a personal, relaxed and cozy environment. Go' Kaffe is a coffee bar for everyone. A meeting place away from the daily stress where you can sit down, in cozy surroundings, and have a cup of coffee. Their prices are super attractive, and they serve a wide range of products, such as all kinds of coffee, soft drinks, beers and wine.

Blue Caviar

At Blue Caviar they honour the history and the tradition of authentic denim and work-wear. They focus on quality over quantity, story over fashion, and integrity over money. Therefore, they have handpicked the very best products from Japanese, American and European denim brands where selvedge denim and Red Wing boots are the cornerstone in the store.

Their brand portfolio counts among others Momotaro Jeans, Japan Blue, Tanuki, Indigofera, Red Wing, Lee 101 and Blue de Genes.

Located in the old bus garages by Aarhus Rutebilstation, Aarhus Street Food serves delicious and sustainable street food from all corners of the world in urban and authentic surroundings.

Descriptions.Text:
15 kinds of meat every day

You can always choose between min. 2 kinds of starters - a fish dish and soup of the day. Furthermore you can taste at least 15 kinds of meat on the grill every night - from US Black Angus to Danish pork. Or what about meat like kangaroo or wild boar with stuffing, made in their own butchery. Every Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday you can enjoy beef tenderloin.

Dishes on the side

At Restaurant Flammen you can always choose between minimum 10 kinds of hot dishes and a salad bar with more than 50 variants. This is served with fresh bread, different kinds of butter, dressings and 3 kinds of sauces.

Grill brunch

Every Saturday from 10 AM - 2 PM you can enjoy a grill brunch at Restaurant Flammen. The Grill brunch is a combination of the grill buffet combined with a more traditional brunch. In addition, you can also make your own burger with meat from the grill.

Descriptions.Text:
Delicious brunch

At Café Viggo you can put together a delicious brunch based on 15 delicious little dishes. If it is supposed to be healthy, you can choose from delicious salads. You can also get a classic café burger, club sandwich or sinful desserts. At Viggo you can get a little of it everything.

The history of Café Viggo

The cafe is named after merchant Viggo Jørgensen who built the house in 1930 as one of the country's first iron houses and department stores - "Viggo Jørgensen Equipment Magazine".

Descriptions.Text:
Grappa - an Italian kiss in the city of smiles

Even though Denmark is not Italy, eating at Grappa will give you the feeling of being in the beautiful country. At Grappa, you will find genuine Italian atmosphere with a modern twist. On the menu you will find a large selection of antipasti, pizza, pasta and other Italian classics, where taste and ingredients are at the centre to give you the most authentic experience.

A meal without wine is like dancing with no music

Restaurant Grappa provides the setting for everything from romantic dinners to spirited family gatherings.

The restaurant's wine cellar is quite extensive and easily puts a smile on the face of connoisseurs and everyone who enjoys life to the full. The angels sing in Italian, with an Aarhus accent.

At Grappa they serve a modern edition of classic Italian cuisine and do their Tuscan magic morning, noon, and evening.

Booking recommended

It is recommended to book in advance if you want to be sure to get a table. Please book on www.restaurantgrappa.dk

Descriptions.Text:
Michelin starred restaurant 2021

Restaurant SUBSTANS is focused on creativity and their praised Danish/French gourmet kitchen is more fun and season changing than ever.

About SUBSTANS

At SUBSTANS you get a casual gourmet meal with focus on taste, craftsmanship and organic produce from local farmers and manufacturers. The food is presented quite neatly and the wine is organic and casual, and often unfiltered. Why add a lot of chemicals to wine when it is better and more fun to drink without?

The menus at SUBSTANS


At Restaurant SUBSTANS you can choose between the menus "Not so big tour" and the "Big tour". The Not so big tour contains snacks and a four course meal. It is for you who want a light dinner or is on a schedule. The Big tour is the restaurant's tasting menu which includes snacks and a seven course meal where you go on a culinary journey.

Gastronomic collaborations 

The staff travel the world to seek new inspiration and discover exciting traditions, techniques, tends and produce. Over the years, Nordisk Spisehus has collaborated with several renowned Michelin chefs from all around the world, allowing you as a guest to be treated the very best of the international gourmet scene right in the heart of Aarhus.

You’ll find Nordisk Spisehus only a 2 min. walk from Aarhus Central Station.

Descriptions.Text:
New Nordic at Gastromé

Gastromé is a small evening restaurant located in the Latin Quarter in one of the oldest streets of Aarhus surrounded by streets of cobbles stone and secret backyards. The menus are seasonal and the ingredients depend on nature and the time of year with good seasonal produce by local fishermen, farmers and breweries etc in and around Aarhus. When you visit Gastromé you will experience that the atmosphere is Nordic, the food is modern, the wine is from all over the world and the service is grounded and down to earth.

Michelin starred restaurant 2021

The two chefs' philosophy translate into their wine, food and quality. They believe in experimenting in a classic innovative kitchen where the sky is the limit. You are only served what the two chefs love themselves and everything is carefully selected.


Half Throttle, Full Throttle or Signature

At Gastromé you can choose between the menus Half Throttle with 5 servings, Full Throttle with 8 servings and the Signature menu with snacks and 13 servings. The restaurant recommends that the Signature starts before 7:00 PM.

Please notice that the Half Throttle menu isn't served on Fridays and Saturdays.

The café offers tasty dishes and refreshments in charming surroundings. All of the dishes are made from scratch from seasonal, Danish ingredients. Those are the reasons they are able to serve wholesome dishes with lots of freshness and flavour. They call it Sturdy Stuff and Fresh Delicacies.

Have your dinner among historical exhibits

The café is decorated with cosy vintage furniture and art. To the curious, the displays contain various house hold exhibits from Danish food culture. Weather permitting; they will be serving food and drinks in the Mathilde Fibiger Garden behind the museum.

Local, fresh, and organic

In the café they take pride in the fact that the groceries are grown with respect for Nature. Their greens are from local farmers, and they only serve meat from animals that have lived decent and healthy lives. The menu is put together in a way that follows the seasonal products, and they strive to always use fresh and organic goods. The café has received a silver certificate, which means that all food and drinks are 60-90% organic.

They also offer a selection of dishes for you, who is a vegetarian, a vegan or require gluten and lactose free food.

A visit to the café does not require a ticket to the museum. Book a table on +45 25 45 45 17 or at cafe@konmuseum.dk

#konmuseum #visitaarhus #visitaarhusregion

Descriptions.Text:
Beef hung to perfection

Dry-aged rib eyes is the most tender meat you can get. The meat is hung to tenderise for several weeks, before it gets prepared on Restaurant L'øst lava stone barbeque in the open kitchen. 

Danish rotisseri chicken

If chicken meat is your favourite, The Grill can recommend Danish rotisseri chicken which are prepared on rotisseri barbecues imported from Belgium, which guarantee a particularly juicy and tender experience for the taste buds every time. 

That little extra

All bread at Restaurant L'øst is organic, and their ice cream is home-made and inspired by the produce of the season. Restaurant L'øst boasts a wide selection of wines as well as an extensive list of international cocktails.

Restaurant L'øst is located in Scandic Aarhus City

Descriptions.Text:
Here you'll find a cozy and urban atmosphere that does not resemble other hotel restaurants in Denmark. From the restaurant you have a view of the Badeanstalten Spain and Aarhus city.

Craftsmanship and classic food

The kitchen emphasizes good craftsmanship with classic virtues and focuses on organic and Danish produce. The restaurant offers a large wine list and all wines are available on glass. We have room for 150 people and welcome both intimate dinners and large parties.

The restaurant is open to everyone and even if you are not staying at the hotel, you are welcome to book a table.

The gin bar 

On the 1st floor, in connection with the restaurant you will find V Bar. With an assortment of more than 70 different gins, the bar can pride itself on being one of the city's leading gin bars. If you would like to board the gin universe in the form of a gin and tonic, the bar offers a tasting board of 3 or 5 different gins. In addition, there is a really nice cocktail card.

Click to read more

Descriptions.Text:
Highly popular brunch place

Juliette is a charming brasserie serving French comfort food in a homely, rustic setting. They also serve tasty beers, fine French wines, exquisite ciders, and delightful bubblies. The service and the atmosphere are both friendly and informal.

Charming back garden

On fine days during summer you can sit outside, either in the brasserie back garden or out in front in Jægergårdsgade, enjoying the warmth of the evening sun.

The place is frequently full, so it is recommended to book a table in advance whether for brunch or dinner.

Descriptions.Text:
The menu consists of delicious, healthy, quality food made with care and love by skilled chefs in an attempt to make healthy food choices easier and more accessible.

Focus on health and taste

At Greenilicious you can enjoy healthy and tasty dishes, meals and snacks packed with vegetables, herbs, seeds, grains and quality meat, demonstrating that it can be a real pleasure to eat healthily as long as plenty of flavour, aesthetics and texture have been included in the dishes. The kitchen also caters for vegans and people allergic to gluten and lactose.

Sweet tooth with a good conscience

Our delicious snacks are made exclusively from pure ingredients and without refined sugar. For example, try our homemade Snickers and Bounty bars, which taste sinfully good and can satisfy your sweet tooth without giving you a bad conscience.

Catering and companies at Greenilicious

Do you need catering for your Christmas party, birthday or staff meeting, a regular lunch arrangement or a cosy place to hold your next event? Look no further – we are always ready to tailor-make a solution specifically for you.

Descriptions.Text:
The atmosphere is raw – and at the same time elegant.

Enjoy a Magic Meal

As soon as you sit down at your table at MALT, the magic starts … from this moment on, the world revolves around you and your guests. All you have to do is: Relax – and enjoy your beer, food and good company.

The Ultimate Zen Experience

Are you looking for the ultimate zen experience together? Leave it up to the chef to put together the menu: Put away the menu, lean back, take in the magnificent room with its historic vaults, see where the conversation takes you and simply look forward to your meal and a wonderful time together.
